Read first: Thank you for suggesting a feature, you're helping to improve this library for everyone! Please fill out each section below, delete the sample text under each section, and delete this opening paragraph as well. Doing so signifies to me that you have read all of these instructions, which is important to me so that I can fully understand what you're requesting.

**Summary**
Provide a clear and concise description of what this feature is. You'll fill out detail in the next sections, here just provide a top-level overview.

**What is motivating this feature?**
Describe why you're requesting this feature, and how including it will benefit you and others. Is this solving a pain point, extending the library to support a common scenario, or something else?

**Detailed Description**
Describe in detail what this feature is, and if you're able how you envision it functioning.
- What is the feature?
- Technical implementation details, if any can be provided
- Are there multiple alternatives to consider?
- Will this be introducing any breaking changes?
- Is this feature dependent on a particular version or configuration of .NET or Postgres?

**Are there any open questions or investigation needed?**
Describe any uncertainties or points for further clarification. "n/a" if none.
